name: Trello theme: gray
description: Gray theme for Trello, with black top bar.
additional_info: Styles include: - black header bar, dark gray buttons - gray board background - subtle card borders, drop shadow on card lists - smaller font for cards - other typography adjustments (board title, red list titles in uppercase) etc. With commented css. See my other Trello styles for extra, smaller modifications: show label text, shrink "New list" button, etc. Updates august 2015: Changed popup window background and Side menu background to light gray (instead of Trello's original light blue); narrow "Add new list" link; softer hover color for "Add new card"
